Author: carbslut
Text: My sister and I have the reverse thing going where we never ever talk about calories ever, but then compete over who eats less of their toast.   I love intermittent fasting. I basically do it full time. I don’t do 18-6 or 20-4. I do 23:30-0:30. Because binge eaters can pack a lot of calories into 30 minutes. I’m not even losing weight. But at least I’m not delusional enough to think this is not a eating.
